abstract: Citigroup is its first customer, an economist writes.
snippet: Citigroup is its first customer, an economist writes.
lead_paragraph: Uwe E. Reinhardt is an economist at Princeton.After first trying in vain to become toxic-asset managers and, next, non-voting equity investors in shaky banks, the peripatetic trio composed of the Federal Reserve chairman, Ben S. Bernanke; the chairwoman of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation, Sheila C. Bair; and the Treasury secretary Henry M. Paulson Jr. decided last weekend to reinvent itself as an insurance company — hereafter the BBP Trio Insurance Inc.
